original_text: But I want you to realize that the head of every man is Christ, and the head of the woman is man, and the head of Christ is God.
korean_text: 그러나 나는 너희가 알기를 원하노니 각 남자의 머리는 그리스도요 여자의 머리는 남자요 그리스도의 머리는 하나님이시라

sentences.original_text: But I want you to realize
that the head of every man is Christ
and the head of woman is man
and the head of Christ is God
